body.description: The proven power of ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda is better than ever. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses cleaner and is designed to work in both standard machines and today’s energy conscious High Efficiency (HE) models. Gentle on Skin. Powers out dirt and odors. Special agents in the detergent trap the soil in the wash water, so it rinses away and doesn't redeposit on your clothes. Perfume & Dye Free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Versatile and affordable. Gentle yet powerful. For generations of families, ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda has been the standard of purity, and a trusted household staple in millions of cabinets and pantries. It's also a natural choice for taking care of every member of your family. Many of our laundry, cat litter, toothpastes and personal care products are made with ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, delivering the quality you can count on, from the brand you trust. ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Skin Free & Clear detergent gives your clothes a deep clean while being free and clear of the perfumes and dyes that can cause irritation to sensitive skin. Free and clear. It's a detergent that's gentle on skin and rinses away clean. Plus, it’s hypoallergenic. Sensitive skin stays comfortable and you can be assured your family’s laundry is as clean and fresh as it can be!

Free of Dyes & Perfumes Free of dyes and perfumes that other detergents have – for a deep clean without the irritation to sensitive skin. Dermatologist Tested* Our specially formulated detergent is hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested.* It’s tough on stains and gentle on your skin. *Claim supported by Human Repeat Insult Patch Test (2016), Cumulative Irritation Test (2020), Wrist Band Test (2018), and Safety in Use Test (2019). ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda Freshness The pure ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda you trust and a deep cleaning detergent to help get your clothes clean and fresh the first time you wash. Certified by SkinSAFE ARM & HAMMER Free & Clear has been rated 100% by SkinSAFE, meaning it excludes 100% of their topmost considered skin allergens and is made for sensitive skin.

ARM & HAMMER Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent ARM & HAMMER Plus OxiClean Liquid Laundry Detergent ARM & HAMMER Clean & Simple Liquid Laundry Detergent ARM & HAMMER Plus OxiClean Odor Blasters Liquid Laundry Detergent ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent Key Benefit Powers out tough dirt and odors. Attacks tough stains better, cleaning over 101 stains (vs. regular Arm & Hammer) Delivers a powerful clean with just 6 essential ingredients & water. Eliminates tough odors - like sweat, body odor, and musty towels For sensitive skin, free of dyes and perfumes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin AND a very sensitive nose, so I prefer to use the perfume- and dye-free detergents. This is the best option out there! I've tried several generic store brands as well as Tide's sensitive version, and Dreft and Purex. I fell like Purex and this Arm& Hammer sensitive skin detergent are the most effective cleaners, and this is definitely better than Purex for just any load of laundry.We have a new baby, so we've been washing everything in sensitive skin detergents just in case he has any reaction to his own clothes or to being held on our clothes. I absolutely love this detergent, it gently cleans dirty baby clothes AND stained or sweaty adult clothes, towels too. (Although, just a note: I HATE the 4x concentrated version of Arm & Hammer sensitive skin detergent...impossible to find the right amount to use without meticulously measuring every time, cause too much leaves soap residue, and too little doesn't clean! But this version is easy to use, without having to measure so carefully.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, just wish was powder
reviews.reviewText: This detergent works great for me since I have sensitive skin (even Tide free still irritates me) & frankly I don't want my laundry scented because I feel that needing it means you're covering up that it doesn't clean well. I haven't had any issues with my clothes looking & smelling clean. I just wish the manufacturer would keep it supplied in powder form for selling. Seriously, the amount of $ & fuel wasted shipping me a liquid that's probably 90% water, plus it needing to be in a plastic jug at a time when the US can't even handle recycling its own plastic use, makes it very unreasonable for it to be sold only in liquid form. I used to be able to find the powder in local stores. But for a couple years now I can't find it in any store or online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: Order often since this is often out of stock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cleaning clothes!
reviews.reviewText: This laundry detergent is excellent for washing clothes and getting them clean! But the packaging wasterrible! The detergent was leaking all over the box! Those two bottles need to have the caps taped so that they would not leak and the bottles need to be secure in the box that they wouldn't be thrown all over! Please take note!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No smell and cleans well
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this product a few times now and am very satisfied with how clean my clothes come out and I appreciate that it is odor free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Detergent at a great cost
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive skin that often causes me to break out if I use the wrong laundry detergent. I stopped being able to find the kind I have been using for the last decade and needed to try something new so I gave this a shot and WOW it does a great job! My clothes feel super clean and don't have any extra laundry odors which is a huge win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: This product works amazingly well to get rid of sweat and body odors from your clothes and grime from your towels. I’ve been trying to buy more natural detergent for my family and I and this was one of the first ones I tried because it was on sale. A little goes a long way and I’ve never felt more better sensitivity wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not spill proof
reviews.reviewText: My bottle was half empty by the time received it leaked out lol j the cardboard box
